item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign Datatype Description Container classed used to hold portal token Local authenticationToken The unique token that is created by an external authentication request. Type: string openIdConnectAccessToken The OpenID Connect access token which provides access to a resource by the OpenID Connect provider. Type: string openIdConnectAccountId The account to login to, if not provided a default will be used. Type: integer
